website_summaries.verdict: Travel-happy audiophiles will be infinitely pleased with the Shure SE530s, but these earbuds should also be a consideration for anyone who has half a grand to drop on some sweet headphones.
pros: The Shure SE530 headphones offer exceptional clarity
They are also comfortable and include some useful extras such as an in-line volume control and an airplane adapter
cons: The Shure SE530s are expensive, and the earbuds are on the large side

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased, but the Shure 215s still give them serious competition.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd pay $100 for a set of in-ear earphones when I bought a pair of Shure SE215s several years ago. I'm still enjoying the 215s to this day, but the roll off on the high end was noticeable. I liked the comfort and the sound so much I wanted to try their bigger brother the SE535s to see if it improved on the high end. I wasn't disappointed - the 535s have a much better high end and a fuller mid-range. I really like them. However, there are some serious diminishing returns compared to their little brother. The 215s are 80% of the sound of these IEMs for about 25% of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: WARNING, Counterfeit product - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: WARNING... The left earphone in my pair stopped working after a couple of months. I sent them to Shure or warranty repair and was informed that they were not manufactured by Shure and were a counterfeit product and therefore were not covered. Even though the listing identified them as sold by Shure, when I looked at the order history they were listed as sold by Dream Sound, however the actual order detail identifies the seller as "Sold by: Hongkuo shoe factory"
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price with interchangeable earbuds
customer_reviews.text: You do not get double the quality compared to other sets half the price but with the removable earbuds they interchange saving me from purchasing 3 different sets. Purchasing this set off the warehouse I even ordered a new set to see if they were any better and they were not so I returned those. If you have the money interchangeable earbuds are extremely useful and do the same thing I would normally have to purchase three different styles for.
customer_reviews.author: redrock435

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have owned the same pair of 535s (bronze) for 4.5 years. I own several types of headphones, but these are my only IEM ones. I do still have a Sennheiser IE-7 which I keep for backup and never need. These headphones have been pretty robust for me and the sound is very satisfying. It's so subjective, so that's all I'll say. Over the years the 3.5mm plug went bad, so I replaced the cable - easy and inexpensive. One ear phone broke by accident, and Shure replaced it for me. Overall very satisfied and expect to continue using them for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Dor A.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC! These have become indispensable to me.
customer_reviews.text: After my first pair of Shure's I wanted to upgrade to one of their better earbuds. These were a good balance between value and cost. The base-quality could be a little more rich i.e. I listen to a lot of trance, etc. (the mids and highs are great e.g. you will hear stuff in your music you have never heard before). Most importantly, this allows me to tune-out the world and focus on graft. ABSOLUTELY NO REGRETS i.e. I could not live without these and they have become completely indispensable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Satola

customer_reviews.title: Best IEM
customer_reviews.text: I have owned about three pairs of IEMs now and I have to admit these are too notch the best ones I've ever owned. The sound quality on these things are just so crisp and clear. I'm coming from a SE215, which typically sounded bass heavy and very light on the highs and mids. These definitely bring out the vocals and instruments you typically would not hear. It's nice that they give you multiple ear pieces, and I love that they create such a tight seal that they eventually become noise cancelling. One thing to watch out for is the cable can get snagged rather easily, but that can be easily avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Evealgenieus

customer_reviews.title: These were fakes
customer_reviews.text: You must take care that the Shure SE535-V being sold through Amazon are not fakes. Otherwise, Amazon does not accept responsibility after 90 days. As a practical matter that means once receiving the product, you must send it to the manufacturer (Shure) for authentication within the 90 day Amazon period. It is nearly impossible to tell the authenticity by just listening to the fake SE535.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Alexlusiv

customer_reviews.title: Love the headphones sound stage
customer_reviews.text: Love the headphones sound stage, crisp and clear instruments and fit. The only reason I took a star away was because of its price and discomfort of the loop around the ear when moving around with the earphones in. The bendable plastic can irritate some listeners, but I can't say for all. The fit is great however. Owning the Triple Fi-10, I couldn't justify its price at 4 times, as I couldn't hear that major difference after switching through it several times. If you need an upgrade, may be worth trying, but make sure you're comfortable with it before you settle as it is quite a big investment.
customer_reviews.author: P. Han

customer_reviews.title: Asian version
customer_reviews.text: Be aware these are the China version!! Only 1 non mic cable is included. Forward mids but the mids don’t aound rich and full. The lead cocal of 4 Non Blondes sounded thin. The high were shrill and mid lows blah. Deep extended bass nonexistent. Unless you like this sound, don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've owned Shure ear buds forever. My last one was the SE530, which I thought was pretty good. I've also bought Ultimate Ears 10 Pro earphones, which was great for low ranges but was missing the highs. I just put on the SE535 which arrived today. My music has never sounded better. I listen to a lot of jazz, classical, and rock. The SE535s has remarkable fidelity; I'm hearing details I did not catch before. At least for my ear, and I would consider myself an average audiophile, the SE535s are the best in-ear phones I've heard. Pricey, but because I now consume 90% of my music through my iPod, these are most definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Sounds fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Years ago, I owned a set of Shure e4c earphones that were absolutely fantastic. They eventually had cable breakdown and just got old (they lasted about 7 years). I have missed them ever since. These headphones are at least as good as the e4c's were, and they have replaceable cables! Yes, the cables are proprietary and cost $25+ to replace, but compared to multiple hundreds of dollars for new earphones, it's an absolute steal. The cable quality is also vastly better than my previous Shures, making me think I won't have to replace the cables in the foreseeable future. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin N. Dilts

customer_reviews.title: Umm, Yeah
customer_reviews.text: Go read the reviews on this product by T. Pines and Jed, and BELIEVE THEM. I have several pair of earphones around here and since I got these, they're the only ones I grab anymore; the others I've used before don't even remotely compare. Seriously, stop looking and just splurge. If sound is your thing, the Shure SE535 earphones are what you want. I laughed when I first saw T. Pines' review and read, "They will change your life," and Jed's review where he refers to them as "Fantasmagical," but you know what? They were both right. Costly or not, there's no going back now - not from earphones that sound this good.
customer_reviews.author: Seeking Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Will take your breath away...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of an audiophile and listen to music 4-6 hours per day. I own about 10 pairs of headphone, 5 or them would be considered "high end". These headphones will take your breath away...detailed amazing sound, clean and clear TRUE bass (not overwhelming or trashy like anything with "Monster" or "Beats" on the label). The balance of these headphones I find allows me to listen to them for hours and hours with very little "listening fatigue", and I have even fallen asleep with them on. These headphones definitely have a breaking period of between 1 and 2 weeks...give them time to get there.
customer_reviews.author: Drow

customer_reviews.title: 535 vs 425!!! Winner 535!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So I tried the 425 and immediately returned since the bass wasn't very pronounce. OMG!! the 535 is crisp clear on more instruments I can distinguish compared to my 3yr old SE215. Bass is good. Can focus on each instrument. I feel I'm in the studio recording or on stage playing with the artists. I'll keep these for a while before I eventually try the 835's. Can't go wrong with the 535.
customer_reviews.author: 2bz2shop

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit!
customer_reviews.text: They sound pretty good, the bass isn't high enough, but its defiantly there. My only real complaint, depending on the shape of your ears, these are very painful to wear for more than a hour. However, I can see how some people might really like the design if they have medium'large-large ears.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: ... Ears IEMs and must say the SE535-V are even better. This particular purchase came with a $50 rebate ...
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my pair of Ultimate Ears IEMs and must say the SE535-V are even better. This particular purchase came with a $50 rebate making it a great bargain. Perfect while working out at the gym or going for a brisk run. The noise cancellation can be hazardous to you health if you live in the city and walk to get around. I was wearing mine at a reasonable level and almost got run over my a bus because I didn't hear it coming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Warrior

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They block out nearly all the sound outside and they sound amazing. Never had a pair of headphones comparable. I even work out in them and no problems with sweat or them coming out of ears. Would highly recommend for someone who wants to listen to music at amazing quality and not have to hear anything around him.
customer_reviews.author: eventually22

customer_reviews.title: Triple Drive Better Clarity
customer_reviews.text: Jumping from the Shure SE215 there is a difference in clarity of the audio when it comes from music thanks to its 3 drivers and base is much better. Many will say sound quality is the same but if you enjoy SE215 or SE112 this the best you can get before going to the very expensive end of this brands earphones
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: There is no question but that these buds project incredible sound. The bass, mid and high ranges are all quite true. Also included is a great choice of alternative ear buds, so great fit is assured. Two caveats; the wires tend to get tangled and the phones can become uncomfortable to wear for protracted periods of time. If you are willing to sacrifice some degree of comfort and are willing to pay megabucks for incredible sound reproduction, this is the set for you.
customer_reviews.author: Arelen84

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Best in-ear monitors purchased. Would buy again, if needed. The highs and lows are balanced. Each instrument is comes out clear.
customer_reviews.author: Content

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the $60 insurance
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones in the market up to $500. The worse coatumer service IN THE WORLD. I bought them 2 years ago, worked great, but when one of the plugs stopped working, and I tried to use my $60 insurance package they sell - not even a single person was willing to help on the matter. I have them brokern for 2 month now and no one seems to wanna help. Sad. Buy on B&H
customer_reviews.author: Tomb.2410

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones I've had the pleasure to listen to!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these earphones. They sound amazing. The earphones are lightweight and well built. High quality materials used throughout. Very comfortable fit once you find the right size sleeves for your ears. There are many choices and you should be able to find one that is right for you. Finding the correct fit is imperative to getting the most out of these as far as sound goes. This is my second pair of Shure Earphones and I am sure I will be sticking with this brand for years to come. HiDEF Lifestyle offered the best price for these and they were quick to deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be better. Can’t tell the difference between my SE215 and these. Don’t believe the hype, get the proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I got these. Fantastic sound! I use them for home/mobile listening, plus as stage monitors in my band. Frequency response is very impressive...especially the bass. Really nice packing job by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jay in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are, hands down, the best in-ear earphones I've ever owned. Crystal clear sound, snug fit, easily inserted, and comfortable for long term use. I use them while gardening and at work. I rarely give five star reviews, but this one Shurely deserves it. My only complaint is the cable. It does not last long with continued use. You will have to replace it, but that's the nice part. It can be easily replaced. Highly recommend these earphones.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in ears
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! I use them every weekend for my concerts!!! Great great choice!!! Love them !!!!
customer_reviews.author: juan patricio borghetti

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sounding, most comfortable earbuds on the market. You are able to listen to your iPod with the sound at 25%, perfectly. Yes, they are expensive, but the fact that you can now replace the cords is huge. I had to replace a pair of E5 earbuds, a predecessor to the SE535-V because the cables went bad. Sure has solved this proble, and this will likely be the last earbuds I ever buy. And you don't look like a dork with the a pair of huge headphones that are all bling and no sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. Shimkus

customer_reviews.title: I will never go back to Beats again.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I was nervous about spending this amount of money on a pair of headphones because I had already bought two pairs of beats by dr dre. These are totally worth it. The clarity is amazing and I have heard things in songs I never heard before, and these were songs I listened to every day. The noise isolating is the way to go. I travel a lot and these will be my go-to headphones now. It's like putting ear plugs in and just hearing the music. No outside noise, nothing. They are also very comfortable; I have worn them for hours and hours with no discomfort at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A FAKE DON’T PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Fake Shure!!!!!!! Checked with Shure manufacturing factory. There is no verification code inside this earphone. Different pin with REAL earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: FPiao

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, excellent sound, complete with bass
customer_reviews.text: Obviously ear buds will NOT shake your pant legs with bass, but these do make good sound all the way down. To get the full efffect you need to go really deep in your year and make a totally air tight seal. Good news they give you at least 5 different sizes and shapes of foam holders. THe bad news is I have unusually deep ears and had to ultimately get custom silicon holders. $500 more dollars.
customer_reviews.author: jjnbos

customer_reviews.title: SHURE IN EARS Shure SE535-CL
customer_reviews.text: ONE EAR AT A TIME BEGAN TO GO OUT AFTER 1 MONTH OF USE....THEY WERE HANDLED VERY CAREFULLY BUT I DONT KNOW IF THIS PRODUCT WAS BUILT TO LAST....I AM A MUSICIAN. I AM TRYING TO GET SHURE TO REPAIR THEM FOR FREE.
customer_reviews.author: JDW Jonathan Davis World

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love my 535's !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about my Shure 535's. I have the Limited Edition Red I.E.M's. Awesome sound quality! Don't have any negative comments. They're the best I.E.M. in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: As I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These iems are a great legacy pair. There are better sounding iems these days especially at this price point, but you can’t go wrong with Shure! Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great Balance and Clarity
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Shure SE535 to replace an old pair of UE Super.fi 5 pros. The SE535 have outstanding balance and bass that does not cover up the more subtle parts of the music. I especially like listening to electronic and live music on them. FLAC quality live music really shines. The cable is well constructed and the proprietary connector between the earbuds and the cable seems nice and secure. The cable is rather long, but that isn't anything that can't be fixed by looping it around my back or iPhone and because the cable is detachable I am not as concerned about the cable breaking due to being wrapped up all the time.
customer_reviews.author: PhiloEpisteme

customer_reviews.title: Immersion
customer_reviews.text: Best ear buds I have ever owned. Sound reproduction is outstanding. Passive noise elimination works well. Base is awesome with midrange and upper registers crystal clear. When I listen to music with these I hear nuances I had never heard before. Expensive, but if you want stellar sound for your important music, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NormCIO

customer_reviews.title: Best speakers you'll ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have been known to spend some money on audio equipment in the past. These were recommended from a musician/engineering friend in NY, and he warned me that they were not cheap. So what. The sound is better out of these buds than my way-more-expensive speaker set-up in my home, and they go with me everywhere. The best speakers you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Bondi

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome. I had a pair of 5xx series for ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. I had a pair of 5xx series for about 5 years before they finally shorted out on me. And absolutely loved them. These are just as good, if not better. Full sound quality and crystal clear. Yes, you will pay for it, but it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Comment
customer_reviews.text: Attention!!! Do not remove the cord from the monitors. Contact becomes unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sound I've ever heard.
customer_reviews.text: Increadible, but I can't wear in ear monitors. Best sound I've ever heard.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJohn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality earphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality earphones. These are the best sounding earphones I have ever experienced. I don't have golden ears, but I have had different sets of earphones over the years and they do not come up to the quality and sound of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Shure SE535-V
customer_reviews.text: Great sound stage. Makes you feel if you're on stage with the performers. Wonderful range with rich bass...not too over powering. Very important to ensure proper ear cup fit. Discovered one ear is smaller than the other...worth trying all the options to ensure the right fit. Definitely need to watch volume control as it is fairly easy to exceed a safe level. Worth the used (second-hand) product cost at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tipster

customer_reviews.title: Worth considering...
customer_reviews.text: The dynamic range of sound is superb but the comfort/fit of the ear pieces could use some improvement along with the type of wire used. Overall, they produce excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and sound great! I use them with my cell phone and the sound cancelling makes everything else go away.
customer_reviews.author: TODD W THOMSEN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Shure's and my second SE535. They are amazing sound but quite expensive. The previous ones I have had problems with the cords, I was extremely happy to see Shure made these with removable/replaceable cords rather than having to buy a whole new set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... so it detaches AT the earbud portion and not like older models where it detached down lower
customer_reviews.text: They messed up and changed the cord design so it detaches AT the earbud portion and not like older models where it detached down lower, so the fit is weird and doesn't fee comfortable at all. What a shame because my old set that I lost was superior.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Best earphones ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earphones, period. I used to have the Bose earphones and thought that they were good, and thought that they were just a bit better than the Apple earphones, then I was looking for an earphone that I could use comfortably on plane rides as the main usage and needed something with noise cancellation or isolation. Once I tried the SE535, with the correct foam plug for good fit, I was hooked and realized how much better the music listening experience on the go can be when you make the investment. The downside....now, I can't use any other headset anymore...
customer_reviews.author: Mao Wang

customer_reviews.title: SE535 amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I own several quality IEMs and head amps. The SE 535 is an outstanding IEM. Wide soundstage and very flat, detailed delivery, amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Don Gervais

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earphone monitors
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earphone monitors. A little pricey and not for most, but if you can appreciate the audio difference, it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: padlam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Rich bass, spacious highs--realistic sound. Much better than any other ear bud or headphone I've ever tried. No, I'm not a sound expert or self-proclaimed audiophile, but I am very satisfied with these.
customer_reviews.author: Bellagio

customer_reviews.title: Last name Ever, First name Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the very first review I've written, for any product....and I'm going to keep it pretty simple. These headphones are wildly expensive; but if you're interested in hearing and appreciating every single thing about the music you love, then these are the last set of headphones you'll ever purchase. I found them to be far more comfortable than they look and the sound is simply spectacular! It is the next best thing to actually being there. It's easy to get a bit of buyers remorse about spending $500 on headphones but after the first ten seconds of the first song I heard using them, I knew that it is one of the best (technology) investments I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Azrael

customer_reviews.title: Best buy I have made
customer_reviews.text: I have never experienced better music quality without the need of batteries to shut out external noise. The only Thing I have noted after long use is that the cable gets green due to moisture conditions, the sound becomes then unclear when the cable has achieved this condition when the cable is in movement, but replacement cables can be bought which is very nice, some of the replacement cables give even better sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: They are rock solid amazing. The sound is incredible and the quality is ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these same earphones twice. They are rock solid amazing. The sound is incredible and the quality is superb. They have taken a lot of use and wear but they still work great.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Oreamuno

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product if you have the money it’s worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product if you have the money it’s worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: MCal92

customer_reviews.title: and rumble like they did with my se215's
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from some SE215's that done me well for 3-4 years. From reading reviews i was worried the base might be lacking. Not the case for me at all, lows still kick, and rumble like they did with my se215's. Now with the added benefit of greatly improved clarity and overall volume boost. I listen to mostly classical(opera,orchestral,choir,etc), rock(metal,classic,folk) and occasionally electronic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shure 535-CL
customer_reviews.text: replaced a set of Shure SE-530's that got misplaced and heard good things about the new SE-535's... but had a hard time believing that they could be that much better in both fit and performance than the previous version, but I was wrong again... the definition, range, and imagery have all been improved and the swivel micro drivers make them much easier to get on (even though it did take a little bit to figure out, but well worth the initial manual dexterity test)
customer_reviews.author: CRH

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: the most amazing sound out of such a tiny little package. Music I have listened to for years have taken on a whole new life. Details and textures I had never heard before were so clear and vibrant. If you can, get a pair of these
customer_reviews.author: David Bunting

customer_reviews.title: Best Ear Buds I Have Owned!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutley amazing. They provide you with so many different ear piece fittings that I'm sure they will fit just as amazingly for you as they do for me. The clarity depth of the audio in these is incredibly hard to believe that its coming out of these little guys!
customer_reviews.author: Red Raider

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Shure SE535 for about 5 months now and they are truly wonderful. The sound is amazingly clear. It is like I have a new iPod. It took a little while to get a good fit, but with some trial and error, they fit comfortably for hours at a time. They are expensive, no doubt, but worth it in my view. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingDoc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Earphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these new earphones. I bought them to replace a pair of older Shure's that had developed cracks and frays in the wiring. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: JHnSC

customer_reviews.title: Best in-ear monitors ever!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is absolutely amazing! Very precise, spacious sound lets you hear every detail of the music. The bass is not overpowering, but is still very present and full, and the built in crossover does wonders for proper dispersant between the drivers and maintaining perfect clarity at high volumes. Overall, they are the best headphones I've ever heard and I'd recommend them to anyone looking for the perfect listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: The product is wonderful. The clarity - superb
customer_reviews.text: The product is wonderful. The clarity - superb! Great condition for used in-ears; however, it was shipped with used covers still attached. Ewe. (Minus one star)
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace stolen 530s. Excellent sound quality. Mainly used on-stage for live performances. INCREDIBLE sound quality when listening to mp3s and great sound isolation for listening while riding my motorcycle. Considering having them "re-canned" into custom molded
customer_reviews.author: Herb Zieschang

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it so great to hear. very light. extra beads. Nice case, recommend to all. one thing if you use for long time might not feel comfortable to wear after.
customer_reviews.author: Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I ever made. These are amazing.. clear, loud with plenty of bass presences. Perfect for drummers playing to click tracks.
customer_reviews.author: luv2cre8

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones, outstanding sound
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. Sound is so clear and detailed. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Shure earphones and I couldn't be happier. The sound is phenomenal, clear and you can hear sounds and other instruments I couldn't hear before. The only drawback is the price, I am a little reluctant to take the earphones with me anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best.
customer_reviews.text: These are simply amazing. The build quality is outstanding. The cable is sturdy, detatchable, and can be upgraded. They are comfortable even with prolonged use with minimal fatigue. There is a reason shure is the best. They are a true audiophIle product that any professional musician or serious and discrimitating listener will appreciate and understand. You could find very good products out there that are cheaper BUT they won't be as solid in build quality or as comfortable to use. These are the Holy Grail for users of lossless mp3 players, or CD listeners. They don't need an amp, though I've tried several; pads, and phones as well. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Navarre89

customer_reviews.title: Would easily buy again if I lost them
customer_reviews.text: A substantial upgrade over the SE-425's. I use them every day. Would easily buy again if I lost them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Beyers

customer_reviews.title: Great high end in-ears
customer_reviews.text: With every penny. Even better with custom fit earpieces. Triple drivers are spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nelson

customer_reviews.title: good sound, difficult to fit properly
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get a good seal with most of the tips with my previous pair of Shure earbuds--it was just a matter of comfort. But with these so far, I can only get a tight seal with the large foam tips. I can't tell if I'm getting all the bass that should be coming through, but most of the sound is pretty crisp and good.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent New Headphones
customer_reviews.text: After three years of very heavy use my old Shure headphones wiring became too frayed and I had to get new ones. The sound on these babies is unbelievably crisp and detailed and they are LOUD. I listen to a lot of techno and there is PLENTY of deep bass in these headphones. I'm very glad I made the choice to get these. My only complaint is that the cord does not include a mic/play/pause button on it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great. After awhile they start to hurt your ears
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great. After awhile they start to hurt your ears, don’t know if it’s because they are too big or not. Still a great earbud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Big hit gave this to my son in law for Christmas, was something he had researched and found to be the best
customer_reviews.author: Betty L Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Transcendent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Simply awesome! You will hear music for the first time again.
customer_reviews.author: William A Holderness

customer_reviews.title: What a deal...
customer_reviews.text: I have never been able to hear the bass and drums when playing live like I can with these. They sound sweet. I play acoustic guitar and mandolin mostly and now I can hear the whole band. Quite amazing!
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: ... full on most that's right on most cells it's great on Galaxys 4and5 HTC superb windows phone super loud ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay here's what I found its power full on most that's right on most cells it's great on Galaxys 4and5 HTC superb windows phone super loud and good on my Nexus 6 nothing well almost nothing but it was not made for music its got no music power but I still love it that's why I have more than one phone more like 5 okay back to the earphones powerfull. Loud. But no great sounds my 200 dollar monster turbine that's good sound I can listen to music all day. But I was able to modified them now they sound perfect.! I'm Ampman Mandroid find me on the Internet
customer_reviews.author: Johnny mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly good earphones. They even manage to improve the sound quality over the 530's, which were phenomenal. If you are in the market for top of the line earphones, these definitely are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: mdantuono

customer_reviews.title: This is how music is supposed to sound
customer_reviews.text: These IEMs do nothing but faithfully and accurately reproduce music. Getting a good seal is very important, but when you do, it's like being transported to a land of auditory bliss,
customer_reviews.author: J. Leingang

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 years of usage... Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and simple: After 2.5 years of usage with a lot of business travels including flights: Those earphones were worth every single dollar! No issues with the cables also. THAT`S a perfect example of why I'm following "Who buys cheap... buys twice...!" - or so. :-) If you love great sound: Buy them. You'll love them!
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: and it's so comfortable you forget you have them on
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but worth the cost. They are durable, the sound quality is mind blowing, and it's so comfortable you forget you have them on. Only one issue, is that after 3 years of using them 7 days a week (and often having them on while I fall asleep), the metallic wire that help keep them around your hears broke, on both side, making them not so comfortable anymore. But still no regret. Best $500 I ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Julien L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing in-ear earphones that I have ever owned. I am not much of a reviewer and commenter on products that I buy, but I really felt the need to rate this 5 stars and compliment the product. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: OnlySane

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from SE212s that were getting a bit old. The price turned me off at first but I'm so glad I splurged. The low end is defined and not muddy at all. Mid-range is perfectly tuned. High end isn't tinny. These sound like my very expensive studio monitors. Other brands that pump up the bass end up destroying what the musician and producer originally intended. These earphones provide the truest experience. The sound quality is so good that I canceled my Spotify account because I could hear how compressed and lacking everything sounded. These earphones will highlight the good and the bad in the music you're hearing.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Shure 535 on amazing Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I was travelling on US and my kids wanted to gift me an ear phone. I really liked this product and ordered while in Chicago to be delivered in NewYork, at my hotel. Amazingly this got delivered within 36 hours! I love listening to music using these ear phones. The product is great and the service of Amazon was marvellous.
customer_reviews.author: Shiv Dave

customer_reviews.title: Superb!!! Marked improvement over Shure SE210 Earphones
customer_reviews.text: I moved up to the Shure SE535V earphones from the Shure SE210s, which are very good. The improvement in sound reproduction is quite remarkable. I am hearing things in music that is very familiar to me that I had not heard before. I use these earphones for listening to my iPod when on travel. I prefer the cable set up on the SE210s but that is a minor quibble. The price is a bit daunting but the quality of sound is worth the price. Superb earphones!
customer_reviews.author: DMC126

customer_reviews.title: SE535 truly is a huge improvement from my previous in-ear ...
customer_reviews.text: SE535 truly is a huge improvement from my previous in-ear headphone, SE110. It actually is worth every dollar spent.
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best Shures I've had yet. Very crisp sound at low and high levels.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Plus and minus
customer_reviews.text: After leaving my late Shure SE315 earphone in a hotel, not to be returned, I waited a few weeks to anti up the steep price for the SE535-CL. The sound and fit are perfect. The only thing I don't get is the long connection wire with no upper connection place to put the volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Pelc

customer_reviews.title: se-535
customer_reviews.text: The best ! Fit perfectly in my ears and sounds perfect. on stage is the best ear phone i ever had
customer_reviews.author: Ssoffiatti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earphones from Shure
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality, even with my old music from the sixties and seventies. I love them. This is the second pair of sure earphones that I've had. They're excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin M. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones a couple of months ago and when the left driver started acting funny I sent the pair back. Two weeks (!) later I received a package containing the left earphone from an SE425, the right from an SE535, and a less robust looking cord from some other model. I sent them all back and am now closing in on four weeks without headphones. Despite the awesome sound (particularly around the midrange), I can help but give these earbuds two stars due to the sheer incompetence of Shure's service department.
customer_reviews.author: Smm3292

customer_reviews.title: too fragile and unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Warning. This product worked well, so long as it worked. But after only one and a half years of normal use, the right phone, after a period of erratic function, finally fizzled out altogether. Now, I'll have to go through the royal hassle of trying to get the limited warranty honored and hopefully get it repaired. For the huge price, this should not have occurred.
customer_reviews.author: gcm

customer_reviews.title: Great Drivers
customer_reviews.text: I had the Shure e5c before and I can tell you that this is far better than it. The bass is stronger and more distinct. I recommend it with everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Albert B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, clarity, bass, highs/lows. Also does a good job tuning out outside noise. Cool design, durable wires which is critical for me because I am hard on earphones normally.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cecconi

customer_reviews.title: Love to listen with this headphone for many hours in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love to listen with this headphone for many hours in a day. This is the best one I have owned so far in the price range that I can afford.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Tom

customer_reviews.title: Truly full range performance
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best sound I have ever experienced. I upgraded from the 425s and these have blown me away. REALLY full range.
customer_reviews.author: Tallahassee

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds, but not for bass-heads.
customer_reviews.text: Great overall buds, Good, secure fit, but not quite enough bass for my taste, if you like highs and mids you'll love these, but the bass is a little lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy with my purchase! Music sounds like I have never heard before!! Would recommend to anyone that plays or listens to music seriously!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Lintjer

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality and usability
customer_reviews.text: Product exceeded my expectations. Sound is clear, good bass, excelent reliability and finishing. So far, I am loving every moment with it.
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS EDUARDO TAIOLI

customer_reviews.title: Great base
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound through it, especially base. If you want great sound quaility with rich base, i recommand it!
customer_reviews.author: KONG

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled
customer_reviews.text: It's like being in a music studio. Very comfortable too. Could where for hours without being irritated by them or having to adjust them to prevent from falling out. UPDATE: I have had problems with these earbuds failing if sweat gets in them. But I am still loyal because of the wonderful support I have received from Shure. Even when out of warranty, they replaced a failed earbud at no charge. I will be a life long loyal customer of Shure products.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch747

product_meta.title: Shure SE535-V Sound Isolating Earphones with Triple High Definition MicroDrivers (Bronze)
product_meta.description: Color:BronzeThe SE535 Sound Isolating Earphones feature triple high-definition drivers for spacious sound with rich bass in a secure, low-profile fit and innovative detachable cable system.
feature_bullets: Triple high-definition drivers deliver spacious sound and rich bass for cinematic audio in a convenient and portable package.
Detachable cable system enables multiple connectivity options for long-term device compatibility, upgrades, and ease of maintenance.
Sound Isolating design blocks up to 37 dB of outside noise for immersive listening no matter where you are.
Secure, over-the-ear configuration keeps earphones in place and cables out of the way for unmatched, long-wearing comfort.
Special Edition version (LTD) with a distinctly tuned frequency filter and a unique color scheme of red earphones paired with light gray 3.5 mm audio cable in shortened 46” length.
Clear SE535 model incudes standard 3.5 mm clear cable, volume control, premium carrying case, ¼“ adapter, and fit kit with wide selection of sleeves for custom fit.
Wireless SE535 earphones (with a Bluetooth communication cable) are also available. Sold separately in 2 colors (Bronze: SE535-V+BT1, Limited Edition Red: SE535LTD+BT1).
Own wired Shure SE535 Earphones already? Convert them to wireless with the new Bluetooth-Enabled Cable (RMCE-BT1). Sold separately.
